title: Dramatic Dune Destination
description: This image of a sand dune field in a Southern highlands crater was acquired when the Sun was just 5 degrees above the horizon. As a result, the image is mostly shadows, with sharply-delineated dune crests sticking up into the sunlight.
theme:
MARS. The Red Planet, one of the most desirable
destinations for humanity
